entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
